custom-sql.sql: SELECT A.*, COUNT(B.portTypeEditorLinkId) AS editorCnt, COUNT(C.portTypeAnalyzerLinkId) AS analyzerCnt, COUNT(D.portTypeId) AS inputdeckCnt FROM EDAPP_PortType A LEFT OUTER JOIN EDAPP_PortTypeEditorLink B ON A.companyId = B.companyId AND A.portTypeId = B.portTypeId LEFT OUTER JOIN EDAPP_PortTypeAnalyzerLink C ON A.companyId = C.companyId AND A.portTypeId = C.portTypeId LEFT OUTER JOIN EDAPP_PortTypeInputdeckForm D ON A.portTypeId = D.portTypeId
